Description: Fan speed sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Fan speed sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

Description: Voltage sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Voltage sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntPowerSupplyTrap
Description: Power supply sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Power supply sensor alert (Sensor name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntSystemConfigurationChangeTrap
Description: System configuration was changed
Trigger Description: System configuration was changed

Name: chkpntSystemConfigurationSaveTrap
Description: System configuration was saved
Trigger Description: System configuration was saved

Name: chkpntRAIDVolumeStateTrap
Description: The RAID volume state is not optimal. Volume state, volume flags, disk state and disk flags are included.
Trigger Description: The RAID volume state is not optimal. Volume state, volume flags, disk state and disk flags are included.

Name: chkpntDiskSpaceTrap
Description: Monitored disk partiton is dangerously full alert, alerts when multiDiskFreeAvailablePercent <=X (filesystem name in trap)
Trigger Description: Monitored disk partiton is dangerously full alert, alerts when multiDiskFreeAvailablePercent <=X (filesystem name in trap)

Name: chkpntRAIDVolumeTrap
Description: Monitored RAID volume state, alerts when raidVolumeState =2(volume ID in trap)
Trigger Description: Monitored RAID volume state, alerts when raidVolumeState =2(volume ID in trap)

Name: chkpntRAIDDiskTrap
Description: Monitored RAID disk state alert, alerts when raidDiskState is one of [DEGRADED (1), FAILED(2) or UNKNOWN(255)](disk ID and volume ID in trap)
Trigger Description: Monitored RAID disk state alert

Name: chkpntRAIDDiskFlagsTrap
Description: Monitored RAID disk flag alert, alerts when raidDiskFalgs contains the OUT_OF_SYNC(0x01) or QUIESCED(0x02) flags (disk ID and volume ID in trap)
Trigger Description: Monitored RAID disk flag alert

Name: chkpntTrapNetIfState
Description: Interface admin status alert, alerts when svnNetIfState =0(Interface name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Interface admin status alert, alerts when svnNetIfState =0(Interface name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntTrapNetIfUnplugged
Description: Interface unplugged alert, alerts when an interface disappear from svnNetIfTable(Interface name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Interface unplugged alert, alerts when an interface disappear from svnNetIfTable(Interface name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntTrapNewConnRate
Description: New connection rate alert, alerts when the new connection rate equals\exceeds X (New Connections/Sec)
Trigger Description: New connection rate alert, alerts when the new connection rate equals\exceeds X (New Connections/Sec)

Name: chkpntTrapConcurrentConnRate
Description: Concurrent connections rate alert, alerts when fwNumConn >=X (Connections/Sec)
Trigger Description: Concurrent connections rate alert, alerts when fwNumConn >=X (Connections/Sec)

Name: chkpntTrapBytesThroughput
Description: Bytes throughput alert, alerts when the throughput equals\exceeds X (Bytes/Sec)
Trigger Description: Bytes throughput alert, alerts when the throughput equals\exceeds X (Bytes/Sec)

Name: chkpntTrapAcceptedPacketRate
Description: Accepted packet rate alert, alerts when the accepted packet rate equals\exceeds X (Packets/Sec)
Trigger Description: Accepted packet rate alert, alerts when the accepted packet rate equals\exceeds X (Packets/Sec)

Name: chkpntTrapNetIfOperState
Description: Interface operational link status alert, alerts when svnNetIfOperState =0(Interface name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Interface operational link status alert, alerts when svnNetIfOperState =0(Interface name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntTrapNetIfRXDrop
Description: Interface RX drops changed alert, alerts when svnNetIfRXDrop changed
Trigger Description: Interface RX drops changed alert, alerts when svnNetIfRXDrop changed

Name: chkpntCPUCoreUtilTrap
Description: Core utilization alert, alerts when multiProcUsage >=X (core name in trap)
Trigger Description: Core utilization alert, alerts when multiProcUsage >=X (core name in trap)

Name: chkpntCPUCoreInterruptsTrap
Description: Core interrupts alert, alerts when multiProcInterrupts >=X (core name in trap)
Trigger Description: Core interrupts alert, alerts when multiProcInterrupts >=X (core name in trap)

Name: chkpntSwapMemoryTrap
Description: Swap memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveVirtual64 exceeds X% of memTotalVirtual64
Trigger Description: Swap memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveVirtual64 exceeds X% of memTotalVirtual64

Name: chkpntRealMemoryTrap
Description: Real memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveReal64 exceeds X% of memTotalReal64
Trigger Description: Real memory utilization alert, alerts when memActiveReal64 exceeds X% of memTotalReal64

Name: chkpntClusterMemberStateTrap
Description: Cluster member state changed alert, alerts when haState changed (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Cluster member state changed alert, alerts when haState changed (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

Name: chkpntClusterBlockStateTrap
Description: Cluster block state alert, alert when haBlockState is not equal to OK (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Cluster block state alert, alert when haBlockState is not equal to OK (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

Name: chkpntClusterStateTrap
Description: Cluster state alert, alert when haStatCode is not equal to 0 (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Cluster state alert, alert when haStatCode is not equal to 0 (Cluster member identifier provided in trap)

Name: chkpntClusterProblemStateTrap
Description: Cluster problem status alert, alert when haProblemStatus is not equal to OK
Trigger Description: Cluster problem status alert, alert when haProblemStatus is not equal to OK

Name: chkpntClusterInterfaceStateTrap
Description: Cluster interface status alert, alerts when haStatus is not equal to Up (Interface name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Cluster interface status alert, alerts when haStatus is not equal to Up (Interface name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntTrapLSConnState
Description: Problem with connection to log server(Log server name provided in trap)
Trigger Description: Problem with connection to log server(Log server name provided in trap)

Name: chkpntTrapOverallLSConnState
Description: Problem with connection to one or more log servers
Trigger Description: Problem with connection to one or more log servers

Name: chkpntTrapLocalLoggingState
Description: Problem with one or more log servers resulted with local logging
Trigger Description: Problem with one or more log servers resulted with local logging
